line.originaltext: 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F)
1 egg
3 cups bread flour
1/4 cup white sugar
3 tablespoons instant powdered milk
1 1/2 teaspoons salt
5 tablespoons butter, softened
1 teaspoon instant yeast
1/3 cup butter
1/2 cup vanilla ice cream
1/2 cup brown sugar
1/2 cup butter, softened (for spreading)
1 tablespoon ground cinnamon
1/2 cup brown sugar
Place water, egg, bread flour, white sugar, powdered milk, salt, 5 tablespoons butter and yeast in bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7}, ing14, "bread ingredients", "")

line.originaltext: Place water, egg, bread flour, white sugar, powdered milk, salt, 5 tablespoons butter and yeast in bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
Place water, egg, bread flour, white sugar, powdered milk, salt, 5 tablespoons butter and yeast in bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
Place water, egg, bread flour, white sugar, powdered milk, salt, 5 tablespoons butter and yeast in bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing14,"added to machine in manufacturer's suggested order")

line.originaltext: Select DOUGH setting, and turn machine on.
Select DOUGH setting, and turn machine on.
Meanwhile; in a small saucepan, melt 1/3 cup butter.
Meanwhile; in a small saucepan, melt 1/3 cup butter.
Add 1/2 cup brown sugar and ice cream; bring to a boil, and cook for 2 minutes.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing15, ing9}, ing16, "things in saucepan", "")

line.originaltext: Add 1/2 cup brown sugar and ice cream; bring to a boil, and cook for 2 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing16, t1, ing17, "boiling things", "bring to a boil")

line.originaltext: Add 1/2 cup brown sugar and ice cream; bring to a boil, and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour caramel into the bottom of a lightly greased 9 x 13 inch pan.
Pour caramel into the bottom of a lightly greased 9 x 13 inch pan.
Pour caramel into the bottom of a lightly greased 9 x 13 inch pan.
Pour caramel into the bottom of a lightly greased 9 x 13 inch pan.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
When machine has finished cycling remove dough from pan and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
When machine has finished cycling remove dough from pan and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
When machine has finished cycling remove dough from pan and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
When machine has finished cycling remove dough from pan and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
When machine has finished cycling remove dough from pan and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface.
Pat dough into a rectangle.
line.annotation: do(ing14, , ing19, "dough rectangle", "pat dough into a rectangle")

line.originaltext: Spread with softened butter and sprinkle lightly with cinnamon.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing19}, ing20, "buttery dough", "spread dough with butter")

line.originaltext: Spread with softened butter and sprinkle lightly with cinnamon.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing20}, ing21, "dough with cinnamon", "sprinkle with cinnamon lightly")

line.originaltext: Crumble 1/2 cup brown sugar over the top.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing21}, ing22, "sugary dough", "crumble sugar over top of dough")

line.originaltext: Roll up, and seal edge.
Roll up, and seal edge.
Cut into 12 rolls, and place in prepared pan of caramel.
Cut into 12 rolls, and place in prepared pan of caramel.
line.annotation: cut(ing24, t5, ing25, "dough rolls", "cut into 12 rolls")

line.originaltext: Cut into 12 rolls, and place in prepared pan of caramel.
Cut into 12 rolls, and place in prepared pan of caramel.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing25}, ing26, "things in pan", "place rolls in pan of caramel")

line.originaltext: Allow to rise until doubled in size, about 45 minutes.
Allow to rise until doubled in size, about 45 minutes.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for approximately 20 to 25 minutes, until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing26, t3, ing27, "cinnamon rolls", "bake for 20-25 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for approximately 20 to 25 minutes, until golden brown.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for approximately 20 to 25 minutes, until golden brown.
